text: Hikmet Çetin (born 10 August 1937)Profile of Hikmet ÇetinHikmet Çetin Eski CHP Genel Başkanı Çetin: Suriye güvende olursa Türkiye güvende olur is a Turkish politician. He was the Speaker of the Turkish Grand National Assembly from 1997 to 1999.Appointment of NATO Senior Civilian Representative in Afghanistan, 19 November 2003 ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Speakers of the Parliament of Turkey
title: Hikmet Çetin
